text:
Vladimir Petrovich Zinchenko (; 10 August 1931 – 6 February 2014) was a Russian psychologist, academician, educator and writer. He got a Ph.D. in 1957. He was also an editor-in-chief of the journal of "Cultural-Historical Psychology". He was born in Kharkiv, Soviet Union (now Ukraine).
Zinchenko died on 6 February 2014 in Moscow, Russia. He was 82 years old.
